dct_title_s: Mobil Oil Hellas, A.E. / Geometrographikon Institouton tēs Hellados "Pyzol" = Geometrographic Institute of Greece "Puzol".
dct_description_sm: Relief shown by shading in 500-meter increments and spot heights. Map shows Mobil stations, four classes of roads, distances in kilometers, nautical miles, tourist pavilions, lodging, hydroelectric stations, archaeological sites, spas (mineral spings), airports, monasteries, 3 classes of towns, borders, eight ferry boat routes. "Phyli (Chasia) Attikē = Fyli (Khasia) of Attica". Φυλή (χάσια) Αττική. Recto: Distance chart, copyright Jules Pujol. Ancillary map: "Brindisi," locating Brindisi-Kerkyra ferry boat port. Title of map on verso devised by cataloger. "Puzol" alternatively appears as "Pujol" on map. Πυζολ.
